title: Documentation Framework for Democratic Resistance
description: Investigation into systematic documentation methods for tracking democratic resistance movements, institutional pushback, and civil society responses to authoritarian capture.
research_areas: What are the specific dates and actors involved in Documentation Framework for Democratic Resistance?
What are the financial amounts and policy changes related to this investigation?
How does this connect to broader institutional capture patterns?
What documentation and sources verify these timeline events?
source_requirements: Government documents, financial records, policy communications
